And lastly the fucked up type, Netorase - it is when a man WILLINGLY lets their bitch get fucked by other guys. To everyone whining this isn’t NTR. He doesn’t like Kido in THAT way. He has a little crush yeah but the one he genuinely wants to be with is Yamada. The last part with Kido is just a video fetish while she jerks him. There’s no real NTR because the final panel of Yamada was just in his head. He imagined Yamada doing it with another guy for one panel. That does not constitute NTR. He made it up. Fabricated it. Not real. Technically this whole thing isn’t real it’s fiction. Hentai. Don’t worry so much over it. But hopefully he takes Kido’s advice and tries to further his relationship with Yamada next chapter!! I think quite a lot of people misunderstood the 4th chapter. Unless the author released a 5th chapter with a different outcome to prove that I’m wrong, I think what happens in the 4th chapter is when mc says that he misses yamada but felt that she's avoiding him, the girl showed mc how she has lovey dovey wild sex with her boyfriend. And she’s giving mc tips that yamada will behave the same she get into lovey dovey wild sex with her “boyfriend” (implying mc can be that boyfriend). The page where yamada was doing it with another guy is all mc's imagination. The girl didn't show mc anything about yamada having sex with someone else. And the last page is her telling mc to watch over yamada because she is sensitive. This is prove that she knows both of them likes each other but didn’t voice it out. She’s hinting him to “go for yamada”.
